title: Question about worlds
body: Do me and my 2 friends (15 year old) need an adult with us to go to worlds? And is it ok to have my moms name on all the tickets even if she's not going? Thanks

replies.body:
Attendees over the age of 13 do not need an adult over 18 with them. As for the tickets having your mom's name on them, I'm not quite sure if that will work. Since the ticketing and entry are handled by Staples Center, I recommend reaching out to them [here](https://www.staplescenter.com/guest-services/contact-us).

Let me know if you have any questions.
